channel.title: [637] Lunar spellbook
channel.description:
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/spells.png[/img]
so basically i have a bug where u swap to lunars and when you click those little images it won't do anything when it's supposed to open the interfaces for spellbook. it does work for ancients and modern, but i have no idea why it's not working for lunars.
rep++
thanks in advance.

item.title: [637] Lunar spellbook
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Is this not client-side? Find the code for the regular pane and mess around with it. You might be able to use the force client setting packet to do something (doubt it though).

Read full topic
